species.name: panpour
descriptions: It does not thrive in dry environments. It keeps itself damp by shooting water stored in its head tuft from its tail.
The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

abilities.name: torrent
abilities.effect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
